`count_value_i = count_value + arr[i]`

This invariant ensures that the value of `count_value` at the end of each iteration is equal to the value of `count_value` plus the current element in the array `arr`. It proves that the program is partially correct because it correctly counts the number of occurrences of the target value in the array.
